metadata.title: CVE-2023-49086 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Cacti is a robust performance and fault management framework and a frontendto RRDTool - a Time Series Database (TSDB). Bypassing an earlier fix(CVE-2023-39360) that leads to a DOM XSS attack. Exploitation of thevulnerability is possible for an authorized user. The vulnerable componentis the `graphs_new.php`. Impact of the vulnerability - execution ofarbitrary javascript code in the attacked user's browser. This issue hasbeen patched in version 1.2.26.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.26+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.26+ds1-1').
